case.title: Curious cross dresser to try threesome in my hotel room - 30 (Midtown)
case.text:
Hey guys
Very curious to try two or more guys at a time. Travelling to the area so looking to make this a reality.
Will entertain all responses but preference goes to guys that can get friends along and are openminded to play with limits.
Send pics stats in first email.
Thanks TINA
